welcome.subtitle: Quality education for our students' future
welcome.description: Situated in Siguatepeque, Honduras. CEE is an Educational institution whose mission is to facilitate the formative processes, involving family, church, and the teachers, that allow for the transmission of information, morals, and values through an education founded in the Word of God. We provide Christ-centered education that shapes knowledge, character, and values through God's Word.

values.title: Values and Principles
values.subtitle: The pillars that guide our educational community

items.title: Passion for God
items.description: We cultivate a deep love for God, placing Him at the center of all we do and inspiring students to grow in their faith.

items.title: Academic Excellence
items.description: We promote academic achievement and intellectual development of each student.

items.title: Respect
items.description: We foster an environment where everyone is valued and respected.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We uphold honesty, transparency, and moral principles in all our actions, teaching students to live with authenticity and ethical conviction.

items.title: Responsibility
items.description: We teach the importance of commitment and personal responsibility.

items.title: Service
items.description: We encourage students to serve others with compassion and humility, following Christ's example of selfless love and dedication to community.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We incorporate modern methodologies for 21st century learning.
